item.title: Tweet
item.description: Dear political parties. Try campaigning sometime before polling day. It’d be great to hear from you, that one time in five years you actually stick your faces over the parapets, BEFORE I vote. Like many, I voted last week. By post. #EUelections2019 ‚ù§Ô∏è 0 | üîÉ 0
